name: Frog Force (mobile compatible)
description:
Frog Force! Long ago the frog nations lived in harmony, but then the bug nation attacked. Protect the unseen flower field from the dastardly bugs with your froggy companions, tongues at the ready. 

If this is your first tower defense game, here's how you play! After you select a stage, use the bottom menu to select a frog and place it along the path. Press Start and hope the frog eats all the bugs that come through! Killing bugs earns money; use it to buy more frogs to defend the path. See how long you can survive!

Some pro-gamer tips for you:

  • Green frogs are average but cheap.
  • Spicy frogs are fast but weak, while Bullfrogs are strong but slow.
  • Poison frogs both damage and slow any bugs near them.
  • Sniper frogs can reach bugs from anywhere on the map.
  • Helper frogs buff nearby frogs' power and speed.
  • Frogs can be upgraded! Try clicking them after they're placed down.
